item.title: Hurricane ISABEL Forecast/Advisory Number 30
item.description:
Issued at 1500Z SAT SEP 13 2003 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
HURRICANE ISABEL FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER  30
NWS TPC/NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL132003
1500Z SAT SEP 13 2003
 
HURRICANE CENTER LOCATED NEAR 22.2N  61.5W AT 13/1500Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  15 NM
 
PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE WEST OR 280 DEGREES AT   9 KT
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE  935 MB
EYE DIAMETER  35 NM
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS 130 KT WITH GUSTS TO 160 KT.
64 KT....... 75NE  60SE  60SW  60NW.
50 KT.......100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT.......150NE 130SE 110SW 140NW.
12 FT SEAS..325NE 325SE 250SW 300NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 22.2N  61.5W AT 13/1500Z
AT 13/1200Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 22.1N  61.0W
 
FORECAST VALID 14/0000Z 22.6N  63.0W
MAX WIND 135 KT...GUSTS 165 KT.
64 KT... 75NE  65SE  65SW  75NW.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW  90NW.
34 KT...150NE 130SE 110SW 140NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 14/1200Z 23.0N  64.8W
MAX WIND 135 KT...GUSTS 165 KT.
64 KT... 75NE  65SE  65SW  75NW.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW 100NW.
34 KT...150NE 130SE 110SW 150NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 15/0000Z 23.7N  66.7W
MAX WIND 130 KT...GUSTS 160 KT.
64 KT... 75NE  65SE  65SW  75NW.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW 100NW.
34 KT...150NE 130SE 110SW 150NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 15/1200Z 24.5N  68.7W
MAX WIND 130 KT...GUSTS 160 KT.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW 100NW.
34 KT...160NE 140SE 120SW 160NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 16/1200Z 26.0N  71.0W
MAX WIND 125 KT...GUSTS 155 KT.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW 100NW.
34 KT...160NE 140SE 120SW 160NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 275 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 375 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 17/1200Z 28.5N  73.0W
MAX WIND 120 KT...GUSTS 145 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 18/1200Z 31.5N  75.0W
MAX WIND 110 KT...GUSTS 135 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 22.2N  61.5W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 13/2100Z
 
FORECASTER STEWART
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
